thread.title: Are Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner still living together?
thread.title_full: Are Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner still living together? - CBS News

author: Zach Seemayer and Deidre Behar ET Online
title: Are Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner still living together?
text:
Months after Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner announced their plans to divorce, the couple have been frequently spotted together spending time with their three kids and even cohabitating.
An eyewitness tells ET that the exes are still living together at their California home in the Pacific Palisades.
Which has got everyone wondering, are they still getting divorced?
Watch: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner seen smiling after family cguounseling The actors were spotted spending their Sunday in Los Angeles on a family trip to a farmer's market. However, despite the time spent together, there was no PDA, and neither were seen wearing their wedding rings.
28 Photos Splits Breaking up is hard to do, especially when you're in the public eye
Shortly after the trip to the farmer's market, Ben, Jen, and their three kids - 9-year-old Violet, 6-year-old Seraphina and 3-year-old Samuel -- rode to church together in their Mercedes SUV.
An eyewitness tells ET they entered together but exited separately -- they seemed to be getting along fine-- adding that Ben had been "protective" and "helpful" to Jen.
After the service, the family returned to their home.
Since news of the divorce, the two have been spotted together on a number of occasions. In August, Ben stayed with Jen and the kids in a rental home in Atlanta, Georgia just days prior to his birthday. A few weeks ago, they shared a friendly sushi dinner with some relatives in Malibu, California.
Watch: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner split: New details on what went wrong For more on Ben and Jen's post-split time together, check out the video below.
